abstract: Larry Rohter on three core members of James Brown's band - Fred Wesley, Pee Wee Ellis and Maceo Parker. And Jody Rosen discusses Fishbone and "Everyday Sunshine," the new documentary film that tracks the band's rise and fall.
snippet: Larry Rohter on three core members of James Brown's band - Fred Wesley, Pee Wee Ellis and Maceo Parker. And Jody Rosen discusses Fishbone and "Everyday Sunshine," the new documentary film that tracks the band's rise and fall.

headline.main: Popcast: Architects of the James Brown Sound Reunite
